extendedInfo.description: The most realistic 3D bowling game on the planet for smart phones! This game takes you to brand new joyful world to experience the real 3D bowling circumstances.Major Game Features:- Realistic 3D graphics for ball rolling and pin actions by 3D physics engine.- Ball hook sliding degrees vary upon oil variation on the lane per playing frames.- Replay video with slow motion (0.25X speed of normal play) for detailed pin actions when strikes and cleaning up spares.- 5 different bowling clubs requiring level clearing scores.- Open Feint leader board system for checking your ranking of the world.How to Play:- Most likely similar to real bowling games.- Start point: Use stance control keys and push set button when determined.- Aiming spot: Use direction control keys and push set button.- Hook: Use spin control keys and push set button.- Release: Decide power level you want by set button, then the ball rolls.

reviews.title: Good app, but...
reviews.comment: You cant go back and cancel your position so if you accidently touch the screen when you didnt want to your screwed.  PLEASE fix that as well as the music options..i cant turn this freakin annoying music off!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice one
reviews.comment: I like this game and it is better than any other bowling game. Graphics id great. Only dont like the dancing and dress of the player. Please remove  that animation and put something decent on plsyer.

reviews.title: Droid Razr
reviews.comment: Need to be able to turn off the music and be able to create your own bowler or at least have more diverse characters ... this one looks like your stereotypical wanna be thug ... not to be harsh but it\'s not cool ! If these changes are made the game would be a 5.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Inconsistent
reviews.comment: The way the lane drys up is so unrealistic. It will change 5 boards from your previous throw which makes it so inconsistent its really hard to get over 240  to get past the second to last level. Other than tht the game isnt bad but that needs to be fixed

reviews.title: Needs a little work
reviews.comment: It\'s not bad. A little work could make this a great game. The bowling pins really need redone. Unlike some other people, I don\'t see any racial bias here, but the character you\'re using is going to have limited appeal and not help the game\'s popularity by any means.  You\'re off to a good start though.
